description: Main Flutter frontend source file for a finance tracker app, defining app theme, navigation, and placeholder screens.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring app-wide theme and navigation.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Handles user authentication flow, switching between login and registration screens.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app container with bottom navigation for core sections.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Placeholder login screen with minimal UI.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Placeholder registration screen with minimal UI.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method overridden in various widgets to define UI layout.

methods.name: _AuthNavigationState._onAuthenticated
methods.description: Simulates user authentication to switch to main app.
